name: The Bones
description:
"Oh, that creepy voice in your head has taken you out of the sweet warm grave. Don't know how long you have been lying here, but these awful human beings built a town nearby. How ignorant! Seems you have to burn it all right now. And have somebody said "the king"? You'd look better with a crown, for sure.."

Go through the town and face different kinds of enemies.

Don't forget you're a skeleton. Tear off your arms and use them as a weapon.

English and Russian localizations are included.
